channel.title: General Family Hiromi Travel Yoyo on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Family Hiromi Travel Yoyo on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: driving across the world.
item.description: It rules. I am having a great time. it is really fun to hang out with my cousin cole, my mom and hiromi. I am going to miss hiromi when she leaves. Cole is becoming a pretty good yoyoer. that rules
